mutants.code:
def generate_pattern(n):
    m = n
    c = 2
    lst = []
    for i in range(n):
        str1 = ''
        str1 += '--' * i
        for j in range(n - i):
            str1 += str(c) + '*'
            c += 1
        lst.append(str1)
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(i + 1):
            lst[-i - 1] += str(c) + '*'
            c += 1
        lst[-i - 1] = lst[-i - 1][:-1]
    return lst

def generate_pattern(n):
    m = n
    c = 1
    lst = []
    for i in range(n):
        str1 = ''
        str1 += '--' * i
        for j in range(n - i):
            str1 += str(c) + '*'
            c += 1
        lst.append(str1)
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(i + 1):
            lst[+i - 1] += str(c) + '*'
            c += 1
        lst[-i - 1] = lst[-i - 1][:-1]
    return lst

def generate_pattern(n):
    m = n

    lst = []
    for i in range(n):

        str1 += '--' * i

            str1 += str(c) + '*'
            c += 1

    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(i + 1):

    return lst
